description: Try our easy to follow Crab & Chilli Spaghetti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Tree nut free,Seafood,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Crab & Chilli Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook spaghetti in boiling, salted water following packet instructions.
Fry 4 sliced spring onions and chillies in olive oil over medium heat for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and cook for 3 minutes until softened.
Stir in crab meat, the finely grated rind of 1 lemon and 2 tbs lemon juice. Cook for 3 minutes until heated through.
Toss through pasta with dill. Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to serving plates and drizzle with a little extra olive oil.
